actions.text: Reported to House from the Committee on Rules, H. Rept. 93-421.

official_title: Resolution waiving points of order against H.R. 9590.  A bill making appropriations for the Treasury Department, the U.S. Postal Service, the Executive Office of the President, and certain independent agencies, for the fiscal year ending June 30, 1974.

summary.text: Provides that during the consideration of the bill (H.R. 9590) making appropriations for the Treasury Department, the U.S. Postal Service, the Executive Office of the President, and certain independent agencies, for the fiscal year ending June 30, 1974, and for other purposes, the provisions of clause 2, rule XXI are hereby waived with respect to specified provisions of the bill.

titles.title: Resolution waiving points of order against H.R. 9590.  A bill making appropriations for the Treasury Department, the U.S. Postal Service, the Executive Office of the President, and certain independent agencies, for the fiscal year ending June 30, 1974.
